example.text: There have been 26,382 migrant apprehensions in the last 72 hours, which is the same amount of time before Title 42 expires. [[user]] is bringing legislation to the floor this week to force the Biden Administration to restart construction of the border wall and end this crisis.
Productive meeting with some of my fellow Gulf Coast congressmen and our local chambers of commerce to discuss common issues and goals in our region. [[url]]

Catching up with local media today on HR 2, the Secure the Border Act of 2023. This bill will restart construction of the border wall, strengthen current law to protect unaccompanied minors from human trafficking, and increase the number of border patrol agents. [[url]]

There have been 26,382 migrant apprehensions in the last 72 hours, which is the same amount of time before Title 42 expires. [[user]] is bringing legislation to the floor this week to force the Biden Administration to restart construction of the border wall and end this crisis.
